## List variable

React component. [ListProps](./virtual-react.listprops.md)<!-- -->. Small abstraction, which in 90% cases allows to avoid hook boilerplate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
List: <T extends ElementType = "div">(props: ListProps<T>) => JSX.Element
```
